title: Unturned 更新版本2.9.0.2
author: sjjklh
txt_content:
http://store.steampowered.com/news/?appids=304930

Steam游戏备份文件：http://pan.baidu.com/s/1bn6Herl
请使用Steam备份与恢复向导恢复安装。

更新内容：
Additions:
-加入车库（garages）：

1窗户window + 1支撑材料support = 1车位
2百叶窗shutter + 2螺钉bolts = 车库门
1毛皮pelt + 1罐子can = 2封口胶带ducttape
-对一张床声明所有权，会使你自动失去其它床的所有
-加入人满服务器会有"server full"提示

优化：
-制作栅栏用的铁丝数量增加
-分解获得的布料和线数量降
-降低左轮手枪射
-降低Proninety与Uzy冲锋枪的射击散布（即提高精确度）

修正:
-Fixed the bars and underside of ramps.
-Fixed a water color rendering glitch. By the way the reason proud water lags you is because it has to render the scene extra times for the reflections.

Networking progress:
Tomorrow I'm going to put the new Steamworks wrapper into Unturned which will hopefully mean Mac support on Monday and the foundation to implement Valve networking.
